document.full_text: rafael nadal enjoyed a smoother ride after his opening match malaise with a 7-5 6-3 7-6 win over fellow spaniard pablo andujar in the french open second round on thursday.
document.title: nadal tested again but wins in straight sets
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal enjoyed a smoother ride after his opening match malaise with a 7-5 6-3 7-6 win over fellow spaniard pablo andujar in the french open second round on thursday.
